resources.name: r/LearnJapanese
resources.descriptionLong: r/LearnJapanese is Reddit's largest community for Japanese learners with over 1 million members. The subreddit features questions, resources, study tips, and discussions about all aspects of learning Japanese. Great for getting advice and staying motivated.
resources.notes: Check the wiki and starter's guide for beginners.

resources.name: WaniKani Community
resources.description: Active forum for WaniKani users and Japanese learners.
resources.descriptionLong: The WaniKani Community forums are active discussion boards for Japanese learners. While centered around WaniKani, discussions cover all aspects of Japanese learning. The community is known for being helpful and supportive.

resources.name: Japanese Language Discord Servers
resources.descriptionLong: Various Discord servers bring together Japanese learners for real-time chat, voice practice, and community support. Popular servers include EJLX (English-Japanese Language Exchange) and others focused on specific learning methods.
resources.notes: Search for servers matching your interests and level.

resources.name: HelloTalk
resources.description: Language exchange app with community features.
resources.descriptionLong: HelloTalk connects you with native Japanese speakers for language exchange. Beyond one-on-one chat, the app includes community features like moments (posts) and group chats where you can interact with many learners and native speakers.
resources.notes: Great for finding language exchange partners.

resources.name: Tandem
resources.description: Language exchange platform for conversation partners.
resources.descriptionLong: Tandem connects language learners with native speakers for mutual language exchange. Find Japanese speakers who want to learn your language and practice together through text, voice, and video.

resources.name: italki Community
resources.description: Language learning community with tutors and exchange.
resources.descriptionLong: italki's community features include language exchange partners, community tutors, and discussion forums. Beyond paid lessons, you can find free language exchange and get writing corrections.
resources.notes: Free community features alongside paid tutoring.

resources.name: HiNative
resources.descriptionLong: HiNative is a Q&A platform where you can ask native Japanese speakers questions about language and culture. Get answers about grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and natural expressions from real native speakers.
resources.priceDetails: Free tier available. Premium for additional features.
resources.notes: Great for getting quick answers from native speakers.

resources.name: Lang-8
resources.descriptionLong: Lang-8 is a language exchange platform focused on writing. Write journal entries in Japanese and get corrections from native speakers. Help others learn your language in return.

resources.name: Japanese Stack Exchange
resources.description: Q&A site for Japanese language questions.
resources.descriptionLong: Japanese Stack Exchange is a Q&A site for questions about Japanese language, grammar, usage, and translation. The site has a large archive of answered questions and active community of experts.

resources.name: Refold Community
resources.descriptionLong: The Refold community brings together learners following the immersion-based Refold method. The Discord server and forums provide support, resources, and discussion for those learning Japanese through immersion.
